Articles.Content: Just updated to 1.01, and the wheels (tires) on the New Medium and Large sized landing gear do not turn... It may not be a massive problem, but it is very annoying.
EJ also noticed this on his pre-1.0 stream. I hoped it'd be fixed before the release, but it seems that it's still present. It'd be great to see it be fixed.
Yeah, same here. Looks pretty lame.
